module.name: reference_data_library
module.keywords: module, class, product, activity, document, organisation, person, library

purpose.p: This part of ISO 10303 specifies an application module to record:

ul.li: a library of classes of product and their composition, connection, and containment relationships;
properties that are possessed by all members of a class of product or activity;
a library of symbols that can stand for classes of product, document, organization and person.

li.p: a library of classes of product and their composition, connection, and containment relationships;

note.p: This capability is provided by the referenced Class_of_product_library application module.
This capability is provided by the referenced Class_of_activity_library application module.

li.p: properties that are possessed by all members of a class of product or activity;

note.p: This capability is provided by the referenced Property_condition application module.

li.p: a library of symbols that can stand for classes of product, document, organization and person.

note.p: This capability is provided by the referenced Schematic_and_symbolization application module.

li.p: individual products, activities, documents, organizations and people.
